Html:
I tried Touchless SDK and after 10 minutes it worked very well, nice job guys :)

I searched for a way to change the resolution of the captured image. Am I right: there's actually now way to do this? I want to use the SDK to capture HD images and it's a pity it won't work this way.

 

I'm using C# and Microsoft LifeCam Studio
See my post here. Change CaptureWidth/CaptureHeight in .Net 4 - Working!
